thread.section_title: The Nadler Soho - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: The perfect location at a fair price
thread.title_full: The perfect location at a fair price - Review of The Nadler Soho, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: FelipeUro
title: The perfect location at a fair price
text:
This was my fourth time in London.
We have stayed for 6 nights at this hotel.
The room was perfect, the attendants extremely kind (special thanks to Alberto, Jessica and Lili).
But the best thing about it was it's location: very close to Tottenham Court Toad Underground station, walking distance to Covent Garden and Oxford Circus and in the middle of plenty of restaurants. Excellent deal. I really recommend it.
